snippet: BMG’s roster includes songwriters who have written hits for performers like Adele, One Direction, Beyoncé and Frank Sinatra.
abstract: Pandora Media announces that it has struck direct deal for music rights with BMG, world's fourth-largest music publisher.
lead_paragraph: BMG’s roster includes songwriters who have written hits for performers like Adele, One Direction, Beyoncé and Frank Sinatra.

headline.main: Pandora Signs Music Rights Deal With BMG
headline.print_headline: Pandora Media and BMG Sign Music Rights Deal

keywords.value: American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers
keywords.name: organizations
